a great unique addition to the metal gear saga  pros  great plot  unique fun combat mechanics with freeform slicing of enemies  great soundtrack  great visual style and art direction  lots of interesting characters  a lot of great humor  cons  movement feels a bit stiff  graphics are a bit muddy  mixed  main character is a huge edgelord and has some cringe voice lines  in conclusion this game is a must play  overall rating 4 of 5
